TopicTitle: Realistic-ish CST-100 Starliner crew tower mod?

Articles.Content: I was looking around to see if there where any good starliner crew tower mods out there and there are NONE. I was wondering if anyone would be able to make a semi realistic crew tower for starliner. If someone does I think it would be even cooler if it could be made out of different segments so you could roll it out and stack it. When I was searching to see if there where any mods for it I can across this image but when I went to see if it was downloadable/public I found out it was not. So I was woundering if anyone could try to make a tower like this but downloadable and public!
